package.name: point_approximation
package.description: This package consists of only one node. The node expects to receive a binary image with zeros and ones which displays a skeleton. For those subscribed pictures the node identify several sets of relative positions which result in a picture similar to the binary image if they are connected by straight lines. The node publishes all this relative positions summed up in one message of the type 'coordinate_sets' from package 'coordinate_exposure'. Therefore, the package is dependend on the package 'coordinate exposure'.
package.author: Philip Tietjen
